--- layout: default title: OHBM 2012 ---
This collection organizes a number of different posters and talks from NISOx and NISOx collaborators at the 2012 Organization for Human Brain Mapping (OHBM) in Beijing, 10-14 June.

Talks

This section lists all available OHBM 2012 standalone talks by NISOx and NISOx collaborators.
  • New and best-practice approaches to thresholding
    Author: Thomas Nichols. Talk from the Advanced fMRI course. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5484736.v1

Posters

This section lists all available posters submitted to OHBM 2012 by NISOx and NISOx collaborators.
  • Heritability Estimation by Non-negative Least Squares for fMRI Data
    Authors: Xu Chen, et al.
  • Fast and accurate modelling of longitudinal neuroimaging data
    Authors: Bryan Guillaume, et al.
  • Erdos-Renyi Mixture Model for Finding Community Structure in Brain Networks
    Authors: Dragana M. Pavlovic, et al.

Courses

This section lists all available OHBM 2012 courses created by or contributed towards by NISOx and NISOx collaborators.
  • Introduction to Imaging Genetics
  • Where's Your Signal? Explicit Spatial Models to Improve Interpretability and Sensitivity of Neuroimaging Results
